full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title: Lettering of T-Shirts and Caps for RCMP, Regina

#### Solicitation Number: M5000-23-0876/A

#### Closing Date: July 13, 2023, 4:00 PM (UTC-6)

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), Depot Division has a requirement for lettering services for t-shirts and caps. The required services include approximately 40 to 45 troops and 2 to 5 special groups per year.

#### Tender Details

*   Competitive, Open Bidding
*   Tender Evaluation: Lowest Price, Per Item
*   Categories: Service (SRV)
*   Countries of Opportunity: Canada
*   Region of Delivery: Regina, Saskatchewan

#### Selection Criteria

Bidders must comply with all requirements of the bidding solicitation to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price, per item, will be recommended for award of a contract.

#### Submittal Requirements

Submissions must be presented to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per page one of the Request for Proposal (RFP). Tender documents may be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

#### Post-Tender Information

Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Bidders are responsible for regularly consulting the Government Electronic Tendering Service for up-to-date information. The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada. As a result, the integrity provisions are being applied in RCMP contracting activities as outlined in this solicitation.

#### Tender Documents

The tender documents may be downloaded from the following links:

*   English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/6373/202300876---m5000-23-0876---a---en.pdf>
*   French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/6373/202300876---m5000-23-0876---a---fr.pdf>
